message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $1250000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, ensuring that both parties walk away satisfied. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
